Keywords: Agents of Atlas , Fantastic Four , Reporter , S.H.I.E.L.D. , Spider-Man Family
Real Name: Cindy Moon
Special Powers
MOVEMENT: Elevated, Hindering
FOUR S.H.I.E.L.D. BEAST HUNTERS: When Silk is given a MOVE action, after resolutions remove an action token from her and she can use Stealth until your next turn.
SILK SENSE: Super Senses, but succeeds on a 4-6. Protected: Outwit.
